concept.title: Upgrade an Installation from the Tarball

conbody.p: upgradefull installation from tarballupgradecore installation from tarballcore install from tarballupgradefull install from tarballupgradeWhen you upgrade a full or core installation from the tarball, you configure the new version to use a new configuration directory outside of the base runtime directory. You then configure the new version to use the same data, log, and resource directories as the previous version. As a result, the new version has access to the files created in the previous version.If you installed additional drivers or developed custom stages, verify that those libraries are stored in a local directory external to the runtime directory before you upgrade. That way, can still use the libraries after the upgrade.
